alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 3:44AM AKST until December 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. East winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts as high as 65 mph. Visibilities reduced to as low as one quarter mile. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on degraded travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow can create for significant drifts.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
